TITLE: Nio reports wider second-quarter loss despite increase in EV shipments
SUMMARY: Nio's second-quarter loss widened, but the company expects higher production and deliveries in the third quarter.

TITLE: GameStop reports wider loss, announces partnership with crypto exchange FTX
SUMMARY: GameStop said quarterly sales declined and losses widened, as its inventory of video game equipment and more swelled.

TITLE: Oracle reports 18% revenue growth after Cerner deal closes
SUMMARY: Oracle said electronic health-record software maker Cerner contributed $1.4 billion to quarterly revenue.

TITLE: FedEx cutting costs, withdraws 2023 guidance after first-quarter shipments disappoint
SUMMARY: FedEx withdrew its full-year guidance and announced significant cost-cutting measures following what it called softness in global volume of shipments.

TITLE: FedEx shares sink after company cites weakening global demand
SUMMARY: Shares of FedEx sank Friday morning after the company withdrew its full-year guidance and cited weakening global demand.

TITLE: Olive Garden sales fall short, but parent company Darden stands by outlook
SUMMARY: Darden Restaurants reported mixed quarterly results but still reiterated its outlook for fiscal 2023.

TITLE: FedEx hikes package rates, details cost cutting as demand weakens globally
SUMMARY: FedEx announced rate hikes and detailed its cost-cutting efforts after warning last week it was seeing demand weaken globally.

TITLE: Bed Bath & Beyond reports 28% drop in sales as it presses ahead with turnaround plan
SUMMARY: Bed Bath & Beyond's results didn't reflect the struggling, debt-laden retailer's turnaround plan, which it announced in August.

TITLE: Lego sales jump 17% in first half of 2022, boosted by Star Wars and Harry Potter sets
SUMMARY: Lego revenue jumped 17% during the first six months of 2022, boosted by top-selling building set tie-ins with Star Wars and Harry Potter.

TITLE: Nike shares fall as overstocked inventory weighs on earnings
SUMMARY: Nike said its revenue rose in its fiscal first-quarter despite supply-chain volatility, while swollen inventories weighed on its profit.

TITLE: PepsiCo hikes forecast after higher pricing helps boost revenue
SUMMARY: PepsiCo reported earnings Wednesday morning that beat analyst expectations.

TITLE: Domino's reports U.S. same-store sales increase and stands by forecast for food costs
SUMMARY: Domino's Pizza reported an increase in U.S. same-store sales and stood by its forecast for food costs this year.

TITLE: Walgreens beats sales expectations, as it expands its health-care business
SUMMARY: Walgreens' profit outlook for the new fiscal year is largely in line with Wall Street's expectations.

TITLE: Delta forecasts another profit after summer boom drives record revenue
SUMMARY: Delta forecast another profit and revenue above 2019 levels for the last three months of the year.
